name: Tap & Clapp
description: Physics puzzle with 80 levels and game editor
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
